name: portfolio1.0
desc: This website was created to showcase my skills and projects. It was also created with an intention to teach myself React and also creating CI/CD piplines using Github Actions.
summary: portfolio website hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server
deployment: The project's versioning is controlled through Github and the site is deployed using Docker and Github Actions. The site is hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server. The intention behind such a setup is to learn  DevOps practices and also to have a quick and easy way to migrate to a new server.
notableFeatures: Shell inspired design that gives users a unique and engaging experience to explore the website.
The project is hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server.
Deployed as a Docker container on the server.
